text: Anata gata wa, shitekina sōdan o hajimeru mae ni hodokoshi o suru koto o shirigomi suru no ka. Karini sore o okonawazu, arrā ga anata gata ni kaigo o yurusa reta baai wa, reihai no tsutome o mamori, sadame no kisha o shi, arrā to shito ni shitagai nasai. Arrā wa anata gata no okonau issai o jukuchi nasa reru
